creator: frodol@dds.nl
text:
Patch to add DESTDIR to all Makefiles.

ie: `make install DESTDIR=/tmp/ROOT' will install everything in
/tmp/ROOT/$(prefix), but you'll have move it to $(prefix) to run it.

creator: frodol@dds.nl
text:
Created attachment 2059
Patch to implement the enhancement
